hero.title: Full-stack developer
hero.subtitle: focused on clarity and reliability
hero.text_home: Hi, I'm Nataliia - a motivated junior full-stack developer with a structured and quality-driven mindset. I build modern, responsive web applications focused on usability, performance, and clean architecture.
hero.text_skills: Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and SQL/MongoDB databases.
hero.text_familiar:
Familiar with Docker, Git, and modern development workflows.
Passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and solution-oriented work.
